column5: Kudo's to Adam Dempsey for creating this masterpiece. It was posted recently on my own forum which frankly doesn't see a lot of activity - hope you don't mind Adam but I had to share this. Every time I look at this picture I laugh.  Chris is visiting a specific outpost camp with his family in August and Adam mentioned that over the years this camp had survived a tornado and a propane tank explosion.  I countered with:    Beer fueled Brock boys > Tornado and propane explosion.  Adam offered this picture of Chris from his trip to Abamassagi Lake north of Nakina.
lol
Oh my gawd thats hilarious!!!
LOL
At least that's how I thought I remembered it happening...
Fireball

I thought that what happens on a fishing trip, stays on the trip or at least with the group involved?  Heck if my wife knew about some of the things that have happened I think that there would be a tackle sale going on here very quickly.
YOU SHALL NOW PASS.....ME  A BEER!!
Awsome
Too funny,lol.
Oh my gawd thats hilarious!!!  I know right. Who would wear green boots with a yellow rain coat.
That is too funny. Chris you are a good sport.
With that amount of empties im surprised there is clothes in the picture???
With that amount of empties im surprised there is clothes in the picture  He could catch his death that way.
The wizard Chris, fears not death.
Drunken idiot yes, wizard, I'm not so sure  You guys keep it up and I'll grab my Thunder Stick and send a fireball right up your back end
..and that was just the first night!

Drunken idiot yes, wizard, I'm not so sure  You guys keep it up and I'll grab my Thunder Stick and send a fireball right up your back end  No, not a drunken wizard or an idiot for that matter. Just a good friend.
LOL.. its nice to finally see a photo on here thats not photoshopped...
i hope it's fixed by july for my fly-in
i hope it's fixed by july for my fly-in  You should send the picture to Howard, I'm sure he'd get a kick out of it.
